# clipToZRange

**Type Property**

An option to search for objects only within the depth range of the current point of view.

## Declaration

```swift
static let clipToZRange: SCNHitTestOption
```

## Discussion

The value for this key is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] object containing a Boolean value. The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], specifying that hit-testing searches only objects between the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNCamera/zNear] and [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNCamera/zFar] distances of the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNSceneRenderer/pointOfView] camera. Specify [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] to include objects outside this depth range in the search.

This option is valid only when hit-testing in the screen space of an [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNSceneRenderer] object with the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNSceneRenderer/hitTest(_:options:)] method.

## Options

- **backFaceCulling**: An option to ignore faces not oriented toward the camera.
- **boundingBoxOnly**: An option to search for objects by bounding box only.
- **categoryBitMask**: An option to search only for objects matching a specified bitmask.
- **ignoreChildNodes**: An option to ignore child nodes when searching.
- **ignoreHiddenNodes**: An option to ignore hidden nodes when searching.
- **rootNode**: The root of the node hierarchy to be searched.
- **searchMode**: An option for the number and order of hit test results to provide.
- **SCNHitTestSearchMode**: Possible values for the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNHitTestOption/searchMode] option used with hit-testing methods.
